ygData.subject: RE: Required times to memorize songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Even though bards don t have meditate skill, I have noticed that clicking on the meditate button while memming songs makes it go a tad bit faster - do you
ygData.messageBody:
Even though bards don't have 'meditate' skill, I have noticed that clicking
on the meditate button while memming songs makes it go a tad bit faster - do
you all do this too? Not fast like a caster but faster than not doing it.
Some songs I click several or more times. Same thing in scribing a new song
- click the meditate button.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2000 2:35 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Required times to memorize songs

If they wanted us to be able to mem songs faster they could just give us
meditate with a really low skill cap (like 1). As far as I can tell, my
meditate skill has nothing to with the speed at which I mem spells (only
that when I have meditate its ALOT faster)
